title: Convert Temperature From Celsius To Kelvin
description:
## Write a program to convert temperature from celsius to kelvin

```
Input  ( C ) : -40
Output ( K ) : 233.15
```

---
python:
# program to convert celsius to kelvin

C = input("Input (C) : ")

if float(C) > -273.15:
    K = (float(C) + 273.15)

    print(f"Output (K) : {K}")

else:
    print("Error: Invalid value provided for Celsius")
